name: Merry Malfunction
description:
Controls:

W/A/S/D or Up/Left/Down/Right to jump, strafe and slide. Alternatively use spacebar to jump or shift/ctrl to slide. (Make sure to click in the frame)

Description:

It's Christmas time at YogLabs, and the testificates are demoing their brand new invention for none other than Santa Claus himself.

Introducing G.I.V.E - the Gifting (at) Immense Velocity Engine. It's a machine that gives gifts and keeps on giving. 100% safe and that's a YogLabs guarantee!
